long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you are a distributed or a collocated team, Retrobot helps you to run retrospectives in an efficient way.

Following the retrospective blueprint, guarantees your team will get the most out of it.

Retrospective blueprint from Retrobot:
1. Set the stage
2. Gather data
3. Generate Insight
4. Decide what to do
5. Conclude & Improve

Remark: Retrobot operates right now as a free service, you have to register at http://www.retrobotapp.com/sign_up to be able to use it.
